data.title: Game Development Company in Germany
data.meta_description: Read this detailed guide to learn about the top game development companies in Germany with top German game developers. All the top gaming companies in Germany.
data.text:
Juego Studios founded in 2013 is the top gaming studio in Germany with expertise in making games in various genres including strategy games, puzzle games, fighting games, RPG games, shooter games, and simulation games. With the use of innovative and cutting-edge technology, they strive to provide a captivating and realistic gaming experience to the players.

They provide game development services such as full-game development, co-development, cross-platform game development, web game development, HTML5 game development, and many more. Their specialization lies in creating metaverse games, AR/VR games, blockchain games, and NFT games for various platforms like PC, consoles, Android, iOS, and tablets. In addition to that they have successfully completed 500+ projects and worked with iconic brands like Warner Bros, Sony, Disney, Eros Now, and Bulls Eye Studio.

Juego Studios was listed in Forbes India Listed Marquee Entrepreneur Special as one of the best and fastest-growing game developers in India. Apart from that, they were awarded “Game Changer” by Brand Vision.

Their notable works: Medals of War: WWII, AFL Evolution 2, Hospter, Royal Dragon Saga, and Hello Kitty Orchard.

Chimera Entertainment is one of the best game development studios in Germany with more than 15+ years of experience in making games. They use innovative technology to create games on various platforms like PC, console, Android, iOS, and Windows phones. Role-playing games, strategy games, simulation games, adventure games, and mobile games were some of the popular types of games made by them. Apart from that they have been involved in developing original IP and are also working on established franchises.

Their notable works: Angry Birds EPIC, Angry Birds Evolution, Shadow and Bones, and Songs of Silence.

Remote Control Productions GmbH is one of the top-tier independent video game companies in Germany with 500+ employees. They provide full-game development services, co-development services, game publishing services, and game porting services. The company has partnered with many game studios in Germany including Chimera Entertainment, Stillalive Studios, FRAG Games, and many more delivering amazing and interactive games to their clients. Apart from that they have made some very notable games for various gaming platforms like PC, console, and mobile devices.

Their notable works: The Ascent, Garden of Life, Shadow and Bone, and Death From Above.

Kolibri Games is one of the top game development companies in Germany that specializes in making Idle games. The studio was based in Berlin, Germany with over 7+ years of experience in creating mobile games in various genres such as casual games, hyper-casual games, and idle games. They create free-to-play games for mobile platforms and social media platforms that are suitable for players of all ages with simple game mechanics and interactive gameplay experience. Adding to that, they have successfully developed 300+ games and have expanded their services to forty-one countries worldwide.

Their notable works: Idle Miner Tycoon, Idle Mail Tycoon, Idle High School Tycoon, and Idle Farm Tycoon.
